article:
On Sunday morning,  Lucy goes to buy some presents for her friend, Millie. Millie's birthday is coming.
When she's walking out of the shop, a girl walks up to her with a smile. Lucy is surprised. Then the girl tells Lucy that she's called Kate and she's a _ of Millie's. She says Millie wants her to go to her party with Lucy.
Lucy is _ that she won't go to the party alone . So they call a _ and tell the driver where they want to go, but the car isn't going the _ way. It's going  to the countryside. "Why?" Lucy asks. The girl and the driver don't answer. Then the girl pulls a _ on Lucy.
Lucy knows she's kidnapped . She must escape! She quickly thinks of a(n) _ . She takes out a lipstick  and writes "SOS" on the _ of the taxi. And then she covers  it with her back..
After a while, a policeman sees the sign and stops the taxi. Then Lucy is saved !
